26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_fb_gf100.c,v 1.3 2018/08/27 07:40:22 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "gf100.h"
30#include "ram.h"
31
32extern const u8 gf100_pte_storage_type_map[256];
33
34bool
35gf100_fb_memtype_valid(struct nvkm_fb *fb, u32 tile_flags)
36{
37 u8 memtype = (tile_flags & 0x0000ff00) >> 8;
38 return likely((gf100_pte_storage_type_map[memtype] != 0xff));
39}
40
41void
42gf100_fb_intr(struct nvkm_fb *base)
43{
44 struct gf100_fb *fb = gf100_fb(base);
45 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &fb->base.subdev;
46 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
47 u32 intr = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x000100);
48 if (intr & 0x08000000)
49 nvkm_debug(subdev, "PFFB intr\n");
50 if (intr & 0x00002000)
51 nvkm_debug(subdev, "PBFB intr\n");
52}
53
54void
55gf100_fb_init(struct nvkm_fb *base)
56{
57 struct gf100_fb *fb = gf100_fb(base);
58 struct nvkm_device *device = fb->base.subdev.device;
59
60 if (fb->r100c10_page)
61 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x100c10, fb->r100c10 >> 8);
62
63 nvkm_mask(device, 0x100c80, 0x00000001, 0x00000000); /* 128KiB lpg */
64}
65
66void *
67gf100_fb_dtor(struct nvkm_fb *base)
68{
69 struct gf100_fb *fb = gf100_fb(base);
70 struct nvkm_device *device = fb->base.subdev.device;
71
72 if (fb->r100c10_page) {
73#ifdef __NetBSD__
74 const bus_dma_tag_t dmat = device->func->dma_tag(device);
75
76 bus_dmamap_unload(dmat, fb->r100c10_page);
77 bus_dmamem_unmap(dmat, fb->r100c10_kva, PAGE_SIZE);
78 bus_dmamap_destroy(dmat, fb->r100c10_page);
79 bus_dmamem_free(dmat, &fb->r100c10_seg, 1);
80 fb->r100c10_page = NULL;
81#else
82 dma_unmap_page(device->dev, fb->r100c10, PAGE_SIZE,
83 DMA_BIDIRECTIONAL);
84 __free_page(fb->r100c10_page);
85#endif
86 }
87
88 return fb;
89}
90
91int
92gf100_fb_new_(const struct nvkm_fb_func *func, struct nvkm_device *device,
93 int index, struct nvkm_fb **pfb)
94{
95 struct gf100_fb *fb;
96
97 if (!(fb = kzalloc(sizeof(*fb), GFP_KERNEL)))
98 return -ENOMEM;
99 nvkm_fb_ctor(func, device, index, &fb->base);
100 *pfb = &fb->base;
101
102#ifdef __NetBSD__
103 {
104 const bus_dma_tag_t dmat = device->func->dma_tag(device);
105 int nsegs;
106 int ret;
107
108 fb->r100c10_page = NULL; /* paranoia */
109 fb->r100c10_kva = NULL;
110
111 /* XXX errno NetBSD->Linux */
112 ret = -bus_dmamem_alloc(dmat, PAGE_SIZE, PAGE_SIZE, 0,
113 &fb->r100c10_seg, 1, &nsegs, BUS_DMA_WAITOK);
114 if (ret)
115fail0: return ret;
116 KASSERT(nsegs == 1);
117
118 /* XXX errno NetBSD->Linux */
119 ret = -bus_dmamap_create(dmat, PAGE_SIZE, 1, PAGE_SIZE, 0,
120 BUS_DMA_WAITOK, &fb->r100c10_page);
121 if (ret) {
122fail1: bus_dmamem_free(dmat, &fb->r100c10_seg, 1);
123 goto fail0;
124 }
125
126 /* XXX errno NetBSD->Linux */
127 ret = -bus_dmamem_map(dmat, &fb->r100c10_seg, 1, PAGE_SIZE,
128 &fb->r100c10_kva, BUS_DMA_WAITOK);
129 if (ret) {
130fail2: bus_dmamap_destroy(dmat, fb->r100c10_page);
131 goto fail1;
132 }
133 (void)memset(fb->r100c10_kva, 0, PAGE_SIZE);
134
135 /* XXX errno NetBSD->Linux */
136 ret = -bus_dmamap_load(dmat, fb->r100c10_page, fb->r100c10_kva,
137 PAGE_SIZE, NULL, BUS_DMA_WAITOK);
138 if (ret) {
139fail3: __unused bus_dmamem_unmap(dmat, fb->r100c10_kva, PAGE_SIZE);
140 goto fail2;
141 }
142
143 fb->r100c10 = fb->r100c10_page->dm_segs[0].ds_addr;
144 }
145#else
146 fb->r100c10_page = alloc_page(GFP_KERNEL | __GFP_ZERO);
147 if (fb->r100c10_page) {
148 fb->r100c10 = dma_map_page(device->dev, fb->r100c10_page, 0,
149 PAGE_SIZE, DMA_BIDIRECTIONAL);
150 if (dma_mapping_error(device->dev, fb->r100c10))
151 return -EFAULT;
152 }
153#endif
154
155 return 0;
156}
157
158static const struct nvkm_fb_func
159gf100_fb = {
160 .dtor = gf100_fb_dtor,
161 .init = gf100_fb_init,
162 .intr = gf100_fb_intr,
163 .ram_new = gf100_ram_new,
164 .memtype_valid = gf100_fb_memtype_valid,
165};
166
167int
168gf100_fb_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_fb **pfb)
169{
170 return gf100_fb_new_(&gf100_fb, device, index, pfb);
171}
